title: DELMADE RELEASES the NEW + UPGRADED Delmade MkII Ripper Pipe Layer

tasks.task: Presenting and explaining a new design of a Ripper Pipe Player.
subtasks: Explaining the purpose of the square reel (lower center to the ground for easier loading of larger pipe rolls).
Mentioning the addition of fork pockets for easier transportation.
Highlighting the benefits of the two fork pockets for moving the Ripper between properties.
Emphasizing the improved efficiency and ease of storage for the Ripper's legs.
Inviting questions from the audience about the product.
Expressing gratitude and ending the presentation.
